description:
Non-Material Amendment to planning application reference 51175/APP/2020/2543 dated 25-01-2022 (Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment to provide a building up to 11 storeys comprising residential accommodation, associated landscaping, access, car parking and cycle parking.

Detailed description:  To provide 103 residential units (2 x studio, 57 x 1-bed, 31 x 2-bed and 13 x 3-bed))

The changes seek to amend condition 3 (approved plans list) following a requirement to relocate adaptable (M4(3)(2)(a)) and accessible (M4(3)(2)(b)) units to be accessed off the north circulation core and to vary the wording of condition 30.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans:

The development hereby approved shall ensure that 3 x 2 bedroom and 2 x 3 bedroom, London Affordable Rent units are constructed to accord with the technical specifications of M4(3)(2)(b) Wheelchair Accessible Standard dwellings as set out in Approved Document M to the Building Regulations 2010 (2015 edition).
To ensure that an appropriate standard of housing stock, in accordance with Policy D7 London Plan (2021).

The development hereby approved shall ensure that 1 x 2 bedroom and 4 x 3 bedroom, London Affordable Rent units are constructed to accord with the technical specifications of M4(3)(2)(b) Wheelchair Accessible Standard dwellings as set out in Approved Document M to the Building Regulations 2010 (2015 edition).
To ensure that an appropriate standard of housing stock, in accordance with Policy D7 London Plan (2021).

The development hereby approved shall ensure that 3 x 2 bedroom and 2 x 3 bedroom, London Affordable Rent units are constructed to accord with the technical specifications of M4(3)(2)(b) Wheelchair Accessible Standard dwellings as set out in Approved Document M to the Building Regulations 2010 (2015 edition).
To ensure that an appropriate standard of housing stock, in accordance with Policy D7 London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than Conditions 3 and 30, which are superseded by the above conditions, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 51175/APP/2020/2543, dated 25/01/2022, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
